section_title: INFORMATION ABOUT THE BASE YEAR OF KAZAKHSTAN:
sentences: Informal consultations concluded Monday with an agreement on draft conclusions that recall the COP earlier conclusion that Kazakhstan will become an Annex I party upon ratification for the purposes of the Protocol, while remaining a non-Annex I party under the Convention.

In addition, the text notes that Kazakhstan wishes to use 1992 as its base year for the purposes of the Convention and requests Kazakhstan to submit its national communication and annual greenhouse gas inventories in accordance with UNFCCC Article 4.2(b) and Article 12 (communication on implementation).
